rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
Functional dining space adjacent to the living room; designed for family gatherings.
Modern kitchen with efficient workflow layout and natural light from the courtyard.
Private bedroom with north-facing window for positive energy according to Vastu.
Additional bedroom ensuring adequate space and privacy.
Multi-functional room for work or study; placed for optimal light exposure.

openings.description: North-facing entrance ensuring adherence to Vastu principles and natural light.
Access from living room to the central courtyard for enhanced ventilation and light.

garden.description: Large garden area surrounding the farmhouse with diverse greenery, natural paths, water features, and seating areas.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard acting as a communal space for relaxation and family activities, ensuring optimum sunlight distribution throughout the day.
